title: LOVE, DEATH + ROBOTS Season 2 Every Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment:
Alright! We need to hear which Volume 2 entry will be crowned BEST! 👑

My two personal favs are POP SQUAD and SNOW IN THE DESERT. Leave your favs in the comments. Let us let the LIKES decide!
Season 2 is good but a step down from Season 1 imo
I loved the animation for Ice. It felt like watching a Gorillaz music video lol
The Snow , was the most realistic CGI/ animation I’ve seen ever
I feel like season 2 had a couple good stories but others that didnt seem to have a meaning at all. Christmas one was awesome!
description: In this video I break down every episode's ending for Netflix's critically acclaimed "Love, Death and Robots" Season 2 from David Fincher and Tim Miller.
